response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. This item holds immense significance to me, but I believe its true worth lies in the hands of someone who can appreciate it fully. Given its rarity and quality, I understand that such a product might not come on the market often. Therefore, I am offering you the chance to own this masterpiece at an exclusive price of $750,000. This offer is tailored to recognize your potential interest and commitment to acquiring high-quality items. I trust that you will find the value proposition compelling. Should you decide to proceed, please let me know, and we can arrange for the transaction. Thank you for considering this exceptional opportunity.", "product_price": 750000}
